title: Push Element to Stack
challenge: Add a new element to the stack of integers.

title: Pop Element from Stack
challenge: Remove and return the top element from the stack.

title: Peek Top Element
challenge: Return the top element without removing it.

title: Check if Stack is Empty
challenge: Check whether the stack contains no elements.

title: Reverse Stack
challenge: Reverse the stack using a loop without reverse().

title: Find Maximum in Stack
challenge: Find the maximum element in a stack of numbers.

title: Count Elements in Stack
challenge: Return the number of elements present in the stack.

title: Remove All Elements
challenge: Empty the stack completely.

title: Check if Element Exists
challenge: Check whether a specific element is in the stack.

title: Duplicate Stack Elements
challenge: Duplicate all elements in the stack.

title: Sum of Stack Elements
challenge: Return the sum of all numbers in the stack.

title: Check Balanced Parentheses
challenge: Use a stack to check if parentheses are balanced in a string.

title: Next Greater Element
challenge: Find the next greater element for each item using a stack approach.

title: Sort Stack Using Recursion
challenge: Sort the stack elements in ascending order using recursion.

title: Evaluate Postfix Expression
challenge: Evaluate a given postfix expression using a stack.

title: Find Minimum in Stack
challenge: Find the smallest element in a stack.

title: Remove Duplicates from Stack
challenge: Remove all duplicate elements from the stack.

title: Insert at Bottom of Stack
challenge: Insert an element at the bottom of a stack using recursion.

title: Check Palindrome using Stack
challenge: Check whether a string is a palindrome using a stack.

title: Sort Stack in Descending Order
challenge: Sort a stack in descending order.
